name: Locale Fallback Resolution
description: Tests the language-level fallback logic for locales in the Root file.

input.content:
Version: 1.0.1

# @IDENTITY
Name: Global Store
Currency: USD

# @LOCALES
en-US: /commerce.txt
fr-FR: /fr/commerce.txt
fr: /fr-generic/commerce.txt
de: /de/commerce.txt
